item.title: Emotion and colour perception: A psychoanalytical theory of graphic design in consumer of goods
item.description: The study focuses on the psychological theory of colour in graphic design on the advertisement of consumer goods. item.description: Bharatanatyam is a highly codified and schematized Asian Indian style of classical dance that accommodates the different kinds of learners. item.description: The purpose of this paper is to review the benefits of using technology and the Internet in the educational sector.
